articles.description: The team detected that the high-energy particles that can otherwise only be coming 'down' from space, were coming 'up' out of the Earth.
articles.content:
(Update: No, NASA hasn't discovered a parallel universe.)
In a scientific discovery that may seem right out of sci-fi plot hole, NASA has detected evidence of a parallel universe in Antarctica where… [+1877 chars]

articles.title: Elon Musk will need more than 10,000 missiles to nuke Mars — Roscosmos - TASS
articles.description: Earlier, Musk proposed an ambitious idea to terraform Mars by bombarding the planet’s poles with a large number of nuclear weapons
